subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|烏竜%茶|うーろん%ちゃ}}: [[oolong tea]]
* {{ja-r|喫茶%店|きっさ%てん}}: tearoom; café
* {{ja-r|紅%茶|こう%ちゃ}}: [[black tea]]
* {{ja-r|古%茶|こ%ちゃ}}: [[tea]] from [[last]] [[year]]
* {{ja-r|粉%茶|こな%ちゃ}}: [[dust]] [[tea]]
* {{ja-r|新%茶|しん%ちゃ}}: [[new]] [[tea]] of the [[year]]
* {{ja-r|茶%色|ちゃ%いろ}}: brown
* {{ja-r|茶%園|ちゃ%えん}}: [[tea]] [[plantation]]
* {{ja-r|茶%会|ちゃ%かい}}: [[tea party]]
* {{ja-r|茶%器|ちゃ%き}}: [[teaware]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|茶%匙|ちゃ%さじ}}: [[teaspoon]]
* {{ja-r|茶の湯|ちゃのゆ}}: [[tea ceremony]]
* {{ja-r|茶%畑|ちゃ%ばたけ}}: [[tea]] [[plantation]]
* {{ja-r|品%茶|ひん%ちゃ}}: [[tea]] [[evaluation]]; a game of drinking varieties of tea and guessing them correctly
* {{ja-r|焙じ茶|ほうじちゃ}}: [[roasted]] [[green tea]]
* {{ja-r|抹%茶|まっ%ちゃ}}: [[maccha]], [[matcha]]
* {{ja-r|無%茶|む%ちゃ}}: reckless
* {{ja-r|緑%茶|りょく%ちゃ}}: [[green tea]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} [[File:Tea soothingr.jpg|thumb|250px|{{l|ja||茶}} (''cha''): a cup of '''[[tea]]'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|ちゃ|yomi=kanyoon}} From various dialects of {{der|ja|ltc|-|sort=ちゃ}} {{ltc-l|茶}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|-}} reading ''chá'', {{cog|hak|-}} ''chhà'', {{cog|yue|-}} ''caa4''.
